page.title: 12DUDDEN HILL NURSERY NEASDEN
page.content: {The nurserymen}can create their own weather conditions because of their greenhouses. They put the plants outside when they are too hot and when they are cold they put them back in the greenhouses. They use gas heaters to heat the plants.The plants are also sprinkled with water about twice a day for{30 minutes}in summer.They put food in the water so that the plants can be fed and watered at the same time. I also saw that they sold some little clay statues of frogs and gnomes for the garden. I liked the cats best.They sold sheds, fences, compost, peat and other things. Of course,they sold plants too. There are{poisonous plants called{Leopard Lilies}these can make your mouth swell up. There were cacti, geraniums, silver birches and many more.I liked the{tomato plants}best as I have some at home.
